Optional Special Application Instructions Job closed Apply via this Link - Co-op/Intern Developer, IT Application Excellence To be eligible for a Co-op or Intern position at Kinaxis, you must either be currently enrolled in full-time education or, if you are a recent/upcoming graduate, your graduation date must be within 12 months of the placement end date. Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
